name: Aragallus lamberti
Relationship: Compare: Astragalus and Oxytropis, two varieties of Loco Weed; also Baryta.

Head: Cracking of lower lip
Burning in eyes
Diplopia
Respiratory: Weight on chest in region of ensiform cartilage
Constriction as of a wide band
Mind: Great depression; worse in morning or evening
Must concentrate his mind on walking
Extremities: Cramps of muscles on front of led while walking

details: Acts principally on nervous system, producing a bewildered, confused state. Symptoms of incoordination and paralysis. Locomotor ataxia. Tired in the morning. Baryta; Oxytropis.
